sentences.sContent: The writer eulogizes the two main female characters whose kidneys are completely different in diligency, pertinacity as well as positive attitude towards life when they encounter difficulties.
sentences.sContent_eng: The writer eulogizes the two main female characters whose kidneys are completely different in diligency, pertinacity as well as positive attitude towards life when they encounter difficulties.
sentences.sCn: 书中描写了两位性格截然不同的女主角坚韧顽强，勇于面对困难不退缩的生活态度。
